kw.name: New Browser
kw.msg: {"browser": "chromium", "headless": true, "chromiumSandbox": false, "devtools": false, "handleSIGHUP": true, "handleSIGINT": true, "handleSIGTERM": true, "slowMo": 0.0, "timeout": 30000.0, "tracesDir": "/home/runner/work/AP_RF/AP_RF/results/pabot_results/3/browser/traces/temp/86d21693-6bc3-428b-9d05-3bcd3fec4625"}
kw.doc: Create a new playwright Browser with specified options.

kw.name: New Context
kw.doc: Create a new BrowserContext with specified options.

kw.name: New Page
kw.msg: Successfully initialized new page object and opened url: https://the-internet.herokuapp.com/login

kw.name: Wait For Load State
kw.msg: Waiting page load to state to receive networkidle in 15000.0
kw.doc: Waits that the page reaches the required load state.

kw.name: Wait For Elements State
kw.msg: Waited for Element with selector css=input#username at state visible
kw.doc: Waits for the element found by ``selector`` to satisfy state option.

kw.name: Fill Text
kw.msg: Fills the text 'tomsmith' in the given field.
kw.doc: Clears and fills the given ``txt`` into the text field found by ``selector``.

kw.name: Fill Secret
kw.doc: Fills the given secret from ``variable_name`` into the text field found by ``selector``.

kw.name: Click
kw.doc: Simulates mouse click on the element found by ``selector``.

kw.name: Wait For Elements State
kw.msg: Waited for Element with selector css=.flash.success at state visible
kw.doc: Waits for the element found by ``selector`` to satisfy state option.

kw.name: Get Text
kw.doc: Returns text attribute of the element found by ``selector``.

kw.name: Take Screenshot
kw.doc: Takes a screenshot of the current window or element and saves it to disk.

kw.name: Get Cookies
kw.doc: Returns cookies from the current active browser context.

kw.name: Set Variable
kw.doc: Returns the given values which can then be assigned to a variables.

kw.name: Create Session
kw.msg: Creating Session using : alias=api_check, url=https://the-internet.herokuapp.com, headers={}, cookies={}, auth=None, timeout=None, proxies=None, verify=True, debug=0
kw.doc: Create Session: create a HTTP session to a server

kw.name: Create Dictionary
kw.doc: Creates and returns a dictionary based on the given ``items``.

kw.name: Status Should Be
kw.doc: Fails if response status code is different than the expected.

test.doc: Inloggen via de UI en de verkregen sessie-cookie hergebruiken voor een geautoriseerde API-aanroep (Status 200 check).

suite.doc: Geavanceerde hybride test: Valideert sessie-overdracht tussen Browser en API.
